mapper.insert: insert into carts(memberId, productId, cartAmount) values(#{memberId}, #{productId}, #{cartAmount})
mapper.delete: delete from carts where cartId = #{cartId} and memberId = #{memberId};
mapper.update: update carts set cart_amount=#{cartAmount} where cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.select: select a.cartId , a.memberId , a.procuctId , a.cartamount , b.productName , b.Price , b.discountPrice from carts a left join products b on a.procuctId = b.procuctId where memberId = #{memberId}
select * from carts where memberId = #{memberId} and productId = #{productId}
